Hope all is well.

 

Regarding invoice no. DN-24-017533, allocated amount for Hugo Boss is around SAR 320k and as per breakdown:

 

Row Labels

Sum of premium

BU

Jeddah Main+ e-commerce Al Khumra

319529

50780

HUGO BOSS - KIDS - NAKHEEL MALL - RIYADH

773.16

50780

 

 

Jeddah Main + Ecomm is not under Hugo Boss. Kindly please let me know the correct brand/BU this is for as this is causing a big movement in Hugo Boss books.

 

Appreciate your help.

 

KR,

 

Nikki
